Projects.Name: Mastermind
Projects.Desc: A dynamic Landing page for a chess academy made with ReactJs and Three.js (react-three-fiber)

Projects.Name: mecX
Projects.Desc: A full Stack Web Application that acts as an job tracker and an appointment management system. Made with ReactJs, ExpressJs and MongoDB

Projects.Name: Dictionary
Projects.Desc: A Dictionary Web Application that gives definition, phonetic, and image for a given word. Made with ReactJs and animated with Framer Motion. Deployed on Vercel

Projects.Name: Calculator
Projects.Desc: A Web Calculator that can solve simple arithmetic Expressions. Made with ReactJs and animated with Framer Motion. Deployed on Vercel
